overview.description: During the Design Phase, the requirements defined during the Requirements Analysis Phase are transformed into detailed design specifications used to build and code the system.

subsections.title: Objectives
content: Translate requirements into detailed design specifications.
Define system architecture, data models, interfaces, and processes.
Establish the foundation for development through approved design baselines.

content.responsibility: Participates in Preliminary Design Review (PDR) and approves final design specifications.
Manages and leads all Design Phase activities, ensuring design artifacts are completed.
Develops detailed design specifications, participates in walkthroughs, and ensures traceability to requirements.

responsibility: Security ensures completion of required security and contingency documents.
Acquisition verifies contract compliance and approved changes.
Budget & Finance confirm sufficient funding and update cost estimates.
Section 508 verifies accessibility requirements and test cases.

subsections.title: Activities
content: Develop detailed Design Document describing architecture, modules, interfaces, and data structures.
Define logical and physical database design and data flow diagrams.
Design application logic, business rules, and user interface components.
Develop contingency and disaster recovery plans.
Conduct Preliminary and Final Design Reviews (PDR/FDR).
Update Risk, Configuration, and Change Management Plans as necessary.

subsections.title: Deliverables
content: Draft Test Plan and Traceability Matrix.
Preliminary User Manual or Prototype Screens.
Updated Risk and Configuration Management Plans.

content.objective: Ensure design is sufficiently complete and documented for development.
phase_specific: Design documented and traceable to approved requirements.

subsections.title: Project Review
content: PDR verifies design satisfies requirements and aligns with standards.
FDR confirms readiness for development and establishes design baseline.

content.title: Design Stage Gate Review
content.purpose: Assess readiness to proceed to Development Phase.
focus: Approval of Design Document and supporting plans.
Verification of alignment with enterprise standards.
Confirmation of readiness for development execution.
